resources.string: Perfect for relaxing afternoons and lively night, Laverys provides a traditional taste of a Belfast Pub. Laverys has long been a favoured drinks emporium for more seasoned individuals, a place to meet, eat, drink, converse and have almighty craic with the punters and staff.

Limelight 1 is the newest addition to The Limelight complex, a brand new purpose build live / club venue. The Limelight 2 first opened in 1984, and has hosted a veritable "whos who" of live acts, Our rooftop terrace, The Rock Garden is open everyday until late and is also open as part our weekly clubnights and live shows.
Stop making sense, We are a non conformist, alternative bar..... purveyors of craft beer, ales and ping pong. The musics not bad either.... Come join us down at Cuckoo!

In the market will be offered a variety of tasty foods and drinks. There is a massive section of the market dedicated to Christmas gifts. For those who want particular objects there will be chalets that will offer a unique piece of art and local handicrafts offering the chance to make a memorable gift.

Culture Night is an annual all-island public event that celebrates culture, creativity and the arts. Special and unique events and workshops are specifically programmed at participating locations and everything is available free of charge.
An excellent craft beer bar situated on the outskirts of Belfast on the Ormeau Road.

An award winning bar that served great food and drink. Situated in the titanic quarter in Belfast the Hudson provides a great space to chill out whilst listening to some top music. Also can tailor for events.
A modern smooth stylish nightclub bringing a new dimension to clubbing in belfast open Monday to Sunday night from 9pm til late.
Ollies is Belfasts most sophisticated nightclub nestled in the heart of the cathedral quarter, it is located in the basement of the Merchant hotel.

The mix match furniture of Filthy McNastys, the quirky décor consisting of mannequins doubling as tall lamps and vintage vinyls adorning the walls create a unique charm which makes all walks of life feel welcome. Food is served in the form of an authentic Italian Pizza. Music from Belfast’s local musicians can be heard daily from 10pm.

Rare spirits, vintage Champagnes, and a cocktail list of encyclopedic proportions, all await your delectation in our Cocktail Bar. We also offer a simple yet elegant food menu daily. The Cocktail Bar offers a menu featuring everything from the classic club sandwich to freshly baked pastries, making it the perfection location for a light meal, day or night.
